title: Divina, está en tu corazón
overview: Divina, está en tu corazón or Love Divina is a Spanish-language telenovela created by Mario Schajris and produced by Televisa, Pol-ka Producciones and Federation Kids & Family for the El Trece network in Argentina. It is a youth telenovela, musical genre and comedy. The series is starring for Laura Esquivel who starred in Patito feo. "Divina, está en tu corazón" tells the story of a sweet and responsible teenager who grew up without a family. With a great knowledge of the life in the street, Divina takes a group of homeless children under her care. The mysterious Irene, who turns out to be the grandmother she lost a long time ago and who longs to approach Divina and repair her past mistakes, leads them all to live in her mansion and rescues them from social services. Divina, who secretly dreams of becoming a pop star, lives with her friends and the wealthy family of Irene - including Felipe, the love of her life - quickly forging new friendships as new and relentless rivalries.
